Sylva is very likable, her approach on life is that of a young lady her age with a lot of humor.There are secrets revealed about her parents, she has to accept (what she learns) or just cope with the truth. There are events in her life that she does not expect, and again she has to adjust and accept.A well written zombie story. Very original, with likable characters and so much action I was on the edge-of-my seat. I liked the added humor and the surprises, I like a story that keeps me guessing. Overall I found Confessions of Sylva Slasher entertaining and very enjoyable. Those who love a great zombie story should enjoy it as well!*This book was a gift to me

Mercer Street (American Journey # 2) by John A. HeldtSusan Peterson, after the death of her cheating husband decides to take a vacation to California with her mother Elizabeth and daughter Amanda. Once there they meet a professor who tells them of time travel.The three women go back in time to 1939. Elizabeth wants to go to Princeton New Jersey to see her parents and (herself) as a baby. Once there Elizabeth gets the chance to befriend her young immigrant parents, Susan falls for a an Admiral, and Amanda falls for a young German man. They all face tough decisions, and must be careful not to alter major events in time.First I have to say I LOVE time travel stories and Mercer Street was fantastic,(it) left an impression on my heart. All three women are very likable, each facing a personal crisis before they go back in time, then they face major decisions once they go back in time.The attention to detail had me feeling as if I were there. The plot is original and filled with many emotions. I also enjoyed the fact they went back to 1939 the begging of WWII (History lovers should enjoy this) I know I did. Overall I found the story to be enjoyable and satisfying a definite five-star read!*This book was a gift

One Black Rose (One Black Rose, #1) by Maddy EdwardsSixteen year old Autumn goes to stay with her friend Carley in Castleton, Maine, for the summer. Once she arrives she meets Holt Roth, a boy unlike any she has ever met before. She also meets his friend Samuel Cheshire, but the reaction to him is quite the opposite.Soon she learns that they are Fairy Princes and she has to chose one of them. For little does she know , she is destined to be a Fairy Queen. For Autumn this summer will not be ordinary and she will be faced with many choices.The plot is original and moves at a steady pace. The characters are well developed. There is a good mix of likable, and not so likable characters. Overall I found One Black Rose to be a delightful enjoyable read. i highly recommend to Adult and young/adult readers who love a unique, fascinating Fairy story.

Fruit Woman by Kate RigbySet in the l980's Helen and her extended family, spend a night at their favorite holiday destination, Myrtle Cottages. Helen's old friends Bella, Bella's brother, Dominic, and Helen's cousin, Les join them. Then Helen's Mother invites someone from church Christine Wigg, a friend of the family.Helen worries over some of the guests, she hasn't seen Bella for years, she’s attracted to Dominic, she thinks it a bad idea for her mother to have invited Les. Her anxieties bring on childhood and adolescent memories.A fast paced story of family and friendship. Old issues are recalled, friendships renewed and past sins are faced. The dialog is rich with plenty of details pulling you into the story. I enjoyed Fruit Woman and feel those who like women's fiction will as well. a great read.*This book was given to me as a gift

The Road Leads Back by Marci BoudreauxThis is the story of Kara and her adult son Phil, who is (also) a young father. Phil's Father Harry was never part of his life. Actually Harry did not know he had a son for 27 years. Kara is reunited with Harry and they try to form a family relationship.Beautifully written, the situations they all go through are real. Not  everything goes smooth for them. They are faced with many challenges, for Kara and Phil, it is getting to know Harry. For Harry it is accepting the fact he is a Father & Grandfather. Add an adorable grad-daughter and my heart melted.The Road Leads Back is a heart-felt story of unconditional love, family bonding, relieving the past and (trying)  to create a good future. I highly recommend to those who love a great read.*This book was a gift to me

Pema's Storm (Rowan Sister's Trilogy, Book 1)Pema is the first born of powerful triplets prophesied to unite and change the face of the Tehrex Realm forever. Pema’s life changes when her Fated Mates returns to the realm. Add ursine shifter Ronan, and things get complicated for Pema. He once belonged to her archenemy. But Ronan is determined to win over Pema no matter what.A fast paced fantasy. I love the triplets. Each one is very different than the other, but they get along well. There is definitely sister bonding. Ronan is likable as well. He was one connected with one of the triplets enemies, and that causes a lot of friction. Which makes for intense drama.The story is original, the plot is steady. The story had a bit too much sex for my taste, but overall a good read. I feel those who love fantasy with a lot of romance/sex will enjoy Pema's Storm. I also really liked the cover, it is eye-catching and fitting to the story.This book was given to me as a gift

Shopping Survival Guide for Men By Dan Van OssA hilarious book on shopping we learn the psychology of shopping. When and where the first shopping MAll is at. Tips for men regarding make-up, handbags, Lingerie, shoes, fashion terminology, color comprehension (names of clothing colors) and critical dates in shopping history.A cleverly written (very, very funny) book. I enjoyed some of the quizzes. I must admit, I failed all of them. I am unlike most women and do not enjoy shopping, I would prefer to shop on-line. The writing is witty and funny. Mr. Van Oss approaches an every day topic with humor and laugh out loud moments. A truly delightful read. I highly recommend to readers of all genres to brighten your day. It was so fun I actually read it twice in one day! 5 stars all the way!*This book was given to me as a gift.

The Serpent's Eye Thomas H. BrandIn the summer of 1816, George Sandings is sent to Buenos Aires to investigate the death of the late Earl Edgar Leeran explorer. He has a month to uncover what he can.George starts a Journal and discovers that Edgar may have discovered things that should have been left alone and forgotten. Soon George finds his own mind is affected with a power that cannot be explained.A very original story told in the form of a journal. George is likable, and is determined to carry out what soon appears to be an impossible task. But Will George succumb to madness as he gets closer to the truth?An enjoyable read. I recommend to readers of all genres. I also liked the cover, it captures a part of the story perfectly.*This book was a gift to me

The Loft: Memory House Collection (Memory House Series Book 2)By Bette Lee CrosbyOphelia is leaving memory house, but she taught Annie how to find memories. Annie moves into the loft and finds that she must help Oliver find that one special memory to save his life.A heart warming story, beautifully written. all of the characters are likable, and play a special role in this story. I really liked Ophelia and Annie. The plot is original, and the air of magic just adds to an already captivating, heart-felt read. I highly recommendThe Loft: Memory House Collection to readers of all genres.* I received and ARR in exchange for an honest review

Engaged in Danger: A Jamie Quinn Mystery (Jamie Quinn Mysteries Book 4)by Barbara VenkataramanThings are going good for Jamie Quinn, a family law attorney. She has a great boy-friends, her law practice is doing good, life is going smooth for her. Then she is hired on for a very high profile divorce. What she thought would be a "good thing" soon turns dangerous, and her relationship with her best friend grace is at stake.Jamie is very Likable, she is her own person and does things her way. Then there is Grace, she is another educated lawyer and likable too. When the two decide to take on a case together, things get intense. It is not just a simple divorce. Jamie and Graces have to face some serious issues.Well written, with drama, intense moments, suspense and shocking surprises. The plot is original, and evenly paced. I highly recommend Engaged in Danger: A Jamie Quinn Mystery to those who love a good mystery. A true five-star read!*This book was given to me as a gift

The Viscount's Christmas Temptation (The Dukes of War, #1)by Erica RidleyLady Amelia Pembroke, a near thirty year old singe socialite discovers that the Sheffield's 75th annual Christmas ball will be canceled due to a storm damaging the ballroom.Amelia decides to approach Lord Benedict Sheffield, with a solution to keep the Christmas tradition going. Viscount Sheffiled is not to worried about this soiree happening, but Amelia is strong willed and won't back down. Will Amelia be able to pull this off with less than two weeks? And is something brewing between the two of them?Strong willed and determined to get her way, Amelia is very likable. Sheffield is likable as well, even with his opposite personality (than Amelia). Watching Amelia with her fantastic ideas, and the attraction slowly building between the too was enjoyable to see.A well written historical/romance. Vivid detail, and dialog really pulls you into the story and the minds of Amelia And Benedict. Add to it the Christmas season, (it) makes a sweet romance . I highly recommend The Viscount's Christmas Temptation to those who love a charming historical/romance.

The Coquette: or, The History of Eliza Wharton by Hannah Webster FosterSet in 1797, based on the true story of Eliza Wharton.She finds herself falling for two suitors, Reverend Boyer and Major Sanford. Eliza is well liberated for a woman of her time, and the situation she gets herself into is quite scandalous.She has her friends and Mother who will all be affected by Eliza's actions. Told alternating chapters, in letters written by and to each other, we know exactly how each person feels.I found the story enjoyable, yet a bit sad (for Eliza) at the way life was back then for women and how they were treated. I highly recommend The Coquette: or, The History of Eliza Wharton to those who love historical stories (based on true life events).* I received this book from NetGalley in exchange for an honest review

Dane Cook by Matt AbrahamDane Curse is a Private investigator with special powers. He has only five days to solve a crime. Due to the death of this prominent superhero the entire city of Gold Coast is in trouble. He has to face tough Black capes and bad White capes in order to complete his mission. Will Dane Curse be able to pull it off?A well written original story. Dane is unique, but very likable. He has super-powers, and sharp wits. The story flows at an even pace. There is a lot of action, drama, suspense and edge-of-your seat moments. The characters are well developed, attention to detail brings you into the story.I feel that those who love a great action/suspense with super-power heroes will enjoy Dane Curse. I liked the cover, it has a comic book feel, yet captures the spirit of (Dane) and the story perfectly.*this book was a gift

Salted by Aaron GalvinLenny Dolan is a Selkie slave in a realm beneath the sea. He is ordered to find a runaway and capture her. If he doesn't then his loved ones will suffer. Soon he finds that the Selkies are faced with a huge dilemma. For them to gain freedom it will be at the expense of others. If he returns without the runaway he will be facing dire consequences. Lenny and friends are about to find out how one becomes "salted".A fascinating twist on merfolk tales. A well written story with a wonderful cast of characters. Told in altering points of view, each chapter is told through the eyes of one of the characters.They are all very well developed, the plot is rich with details. I really got to feel what each was thinking. The descriptive details drew me into the story as if I were there. There is an equal mix of drama, suspense, action and some soul searching.I highly recommend Salted to Adults and Young/Adults who love fantasy, especially creatures of the sea. The cover is very eye catching and fits perfect with the story.*This book was given to me as a gift

Heaven: A Post Apocalyptic Fantasy by Julie Elizabeth PowellA fascinating story about the last person on earth. Told in first person form, we really get the feel of what it (might be) like after the apocalypse. Although it is a short story, there is a lot of emotions flowing within the pages of this fascinating fantasy. From the first page up until the fabulous ending I was engrossed, and captivated. I also really like the cover, it is beautiful and fits perfect with the story.*This book was given to me as a gift

The Blackwell Family Secret: The Guardians of Sin by Jonathan L. FerraraNicolas Blackwell was orphaned at age seven when two demonic men killed his parents . He finds he has a Guardian Angel and that he is holding the Seven deadly sins. His is tricked by a serpent and the sins are released. It is now up to him and his friend Amy to go to the city of Demonio and defeat the seven Guardians of the sins.Young Nicholas is very likable, along with Amy. They face many dangerous creatures and have to work together to conquer them. There is a lot of danger, action, drama, suspense and secrets . The characters are well developed , the plot is original and detailed, making you feel part of the story. I liked the blending of religion and fantasy, it made a very interesting page turning read.I highly recommend The Blackwell Family Secret: The Guardians of Sin to lovers of fantasy , (adult and y/a readers). The cover is very fitting to the story, it captures Nicholas and his mission perfectly.

Seal of a Monk by Eden BayleeLainey Lee returns to Hawaii for a mediation class to try to find inner peace. A few days later one of the mediators disappears. With the help of a retired Navy Seal, Max they try to find the missing woman.Lainey is very likable, she is getting over a divorce and the horrors of her last Hawaiian visit. I liked Max too, could he possibly be the one to steal her heart?The story moves at an even pace, with drama, suspense and a splash of romance. The characters are well developed,the plot is original, and the Hawaiian setting exotic. Overall I felt SEAL OF A MONK was very enjoyable and readers of any genre will enjoy it as well.

Magic of the Gargoyles by Rebecca ChastainEarth Elemental Mika Stillwater is on a mission to save a nest of baby gargoyles. Mika must save them from the Black Magic villains who want to use the gargoyles magic for an evil power boost. When their magic is taken so are their lives.A very original novella. Mika is likable, she is determined to do the right thing, and save the baby gargoyles. The Gargoyles are so adorable and likable. I have never read a story like this. It was fun, adventurous, dangerous and rewarding.I loved the originality and the attention to detail. I highly recommend Magic of the Gargoyles: An Elemental Fantasy Novella to adults/Young Adults who love a great fantasy! (The cover is eye catching, I thought it fit well with the story).*This book was given to me as a gift.

Six Epic Adventure Novels (Into the Americas / The Orphan Trilogy / The World Duology) By Lance Morcan & James MorcanInto the Americas (A novel based on a true story) :A fascinating and thrilling read about one young man's adventure set in the 1800 sailing to north america. once there he and one man survive and become slaves to the natives. It is also a love story , John falls in love with a native and must chose between going home or staying with his Wife and newborn baby.The Orphan trilogy is a fantastic story, that was so well written I truly believe something like this could happen. Genetically trained orphans destined to become assassins. The orphans are kept secret from the world, and are also coming of age. There is so much action, drama, thrills and edge of your seat moments, I was hooked from the first page, and could not wait to see how the story unfolds in the end.World Duology book 1 & 2 set in the 19th century is another fantastic action filled dramatic suspense filled read. We follow three young travelers  from America to Africa, from England to the Canary Islands, to Australia, New Zealand, Samoa and Fiji. They are faced with many dangers along the way. Native American Indians, Barbary Coast Pirates, Aborigines, Maoris and Pacific Islanders.This is a fantastic boxed set. Perfect for yourself or your reader as a gift. There is plenty of research that went into these stories, along with non stop suspense/action/drama/thrills. I highly recommend to book lovers of all genres.I look forward to the next masterpiece by the Morcans!

Into the Americas (A novel based on a true story) By Lance MorcanBased on a true story (by the diary) of English blacksmith John Jewitt during his time aboard The Boston and during his time at Nootka Sound, on North America's Western seaboard (from 1802 to 1805).Nineteen year old John Jewitt is one of only two survivors after his crew mates clash with the Mowachaht tribe in the Pacific Northwest. They are held as slaves by Maquina, the Mowachat Chief. They make several attempts to escape.John falls in love with Eu-Stochee, a beautiful Indian. When John learns Eu-Stochee is pregnant he must choose between returning to civilization or staying with her and their newborn son.A fascinating story of one young mans courageous voyage. Well written with attention to detail, we really get the feel of what young John went through. The characters are based on real people, which adds to the intense drama. The dialog and events are true to that era.Overall I greatly enjoyed Into the Americas and highly recommend to readers of all genres, especially those who like history. I feel Young Adults will enjoy this read as well. A true five star read. I also like the cover, it is beautiful and represents the story with flare.

Rampage: A Jason Scarsdale Novel by Alan BrenhamDetective Jason Scarsdale finds himself in a race against time to hunt down a vicious gang that are on a killing spree. Add to it his new partner Tatum Harper, could be trouble. Will she come between him and his long time/long distance girlfriend Dani Mueller? Will he and Dani be able to stop the gang?A fast paced murder/thriller. Jason and his daughter are very likable. His personal life problems are true to life. Being a single Dad, and working in his profession is not an easy task, but he pulls both off well. Add his long distance relationship, the danger of his job, the new female partner and we have intense drama.The plot is original, intense, gripping and thrilling. The characters are well developed. The action/drama/thrill is non stop, nail-biting, page turning suspense filled. I strongly recommend to those who love a great thrilling read.

Not Without Nancy (Texas Boys Falling Fast series Book 4) By Jan RomesTrigg Sinclair a wealthy cattleman had his eye on Nancy Reeger since seeing her at his friend Ty's wedding. He thinks she is perfect for him even though (they) very opposite.Nancy Reeger is stressed out cardiac rehab nurse and never has time to relax. Although Trigg Sinclair is a handsome man, he is also a player and Nancy does not have time in her life for someone like him.But sparks fly and it is hard for Nancy to deny her feelings for Trigg, the same goes for him. Trigg is more aggressive in his pursuit for Nancy, used to getting what he wants. But will Nancy follow her heart?Well written with a balance of drama, secrets, friendship and romance. Nancy is very likable, (She is) a cardiac nurse, very smart, and thinks she knows what she wants out of life. Trigg is charming, everyone in Dallas seems to want the dashing bachelor, but he only has eyes for Nancy.Both are facing their own inner struggles, and one is hiding a life long secret. Having all the "gang" together in the fourth installment was perfect. Watching how the story unfolds was intense. It flows perfectly, and it became an all night read. I highly recommend Not Without Nancy to those who love a great romance.

Taming Tori (Texas Boys Falling Fast Book 3) by Jan RomesJake Garrison, one of Dallas's most eligible bachelors is an really nice guy. He is quiet, well grounded and set in his life. Until Tori sets her eyes on him.Tori Caye, a spoiled and mean debutante who is used to getting her way, even if it means making enemies. After her fiance of two years calls off their engagement, she throws herself at Jake. She knows what she wants and is not afraid to go after it.Jake is very likable, the "boy next door type", he is super rich but does not let that change his nice personality. Tori is out right mean, difficult, and at times not very likable.The two are a very unlikely pair, there is a lot of drama, tension among friends, many differences between them , yet they still attempt a relationship. It was very interesting to see how the story unfolds, and where it will end? Will Jake be able to Tame Tori? and does he really want to?I highly recommend Taming Tori to those who like romance. The story is original and fun.I look forward to reading book four in the series Not Without Nancy.

I was skeptical about these patches at first, but I was willing to give it a try and boy I am so glad I did. I never really thought I needed this product, but I must say I notice the difference in my skin. I have been wearing them for a few weeks now so I could really see if the product actually worked on me. I have acne prone skin and tend to have break outs in the chest area so was not sure how this product would work on my skin. Gladly, I did not break out nor did it cause irritation to my skin. After a few wears, I started to notice my skin firm up and look tighter and it made "the girls" look better if you know what I mean. The patches are very soft and comfortable to wear. Some days I would wear them to bed and others I would wear after showering in the morning for a hour or so. They are easy to apply and to clean off for multiple uses. I really enjoyed using these and the results are fantastic especially if you have a few wrinkles or two in that area. Overall I think these patches work great and if you ladies or gents need to tone it up a bit give them a try.  I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I was very excited to try this little guy out for I have been needing a humidifier for myself as well as for my children. This could not have came at a better time with all the weather changing and sinus issues. First off, I would like to say that I love how compact and portable this is. It is fairly easy to pick up and take with you from room to room, in your purse,  in your carry on, or even in your diaper bag. The instructions are fairly easy to follow and it is not difficult to use. All you need is an outlet and a spot to place your cup on and you are on your way. I first used it in my son's room and was very surprised at how much vapor came out of this little humidifier. Not to mention, it relatively made no sound at all so you can sleep peacefully without any annoying sounds. My son actually made it through the night without coughing, so it is safe to say it worked. Overall I think this humidifier is great and it serves its purpose very well. If you decide to purchase this humidifier, you will not be disappointed. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

l have been using this brush now for a few days and I can say it gets the job done. Not only does it get the tangles out, but it also makes my hair a lot easier to maintain. I have thick natural curly hair and it gets tangled all the time. Detangling can hurt and pulls out my hair strains if not done carefully. This brush is very light weight plastic so I was skeptical of if being able to tackle my kinks, but sure enough it did. It is very gentle on hair and scalp and works through strains fairly well. I was very impressed at how well it detangles my hair wet or dry. Also it doesn't pull out my hair like other brushes or combs so that is a plus in my book. I highly recommend this brush to anyone and for all hair types. If it can work on my hair, it'll work on yours as well. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

I really like this mill. It has a nice sleek look that will look great on any kitchen countertop. It is easy to hold with the non slip grip coating and it fits comfortably into your hand for easy use. It does take 6 AAA batteries that are not included, but it gives it a lot of power to grind. It was difficult at first for me to open it up, but other than that no problems. There are 3 grain sizes fine, medium, and course that you can choose from. To grind you just fill up the mill, select your grain preference and then press the button at the top and tada fresh ground pepper in no time. Overall a nice quality mill that will get many more uses from me. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

My first time trying a steamer and this one is really neat. Once I figured out how to open the steamer, I was very impressed with the quality and the innovation. It comes in a small box and is compacted together, but once you open it up it contracts and is very flexible to fix any size pot. It is fairly easy to use and clean. I steamed broccoli the first time by  placing the broccoli on the steamer and lowering it by the center ring into a pot of boiling water and let the steam work its magic. My vegetables turned out great. Also since the steamer contracts it is very easy to store away in a drawer or cabinet without taking up too much space. Overall a great product that I can't wait to continue to use for healthier eating. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I absolutely love this set. So I was in the market for an apple slicer and came across the wonderful set that comes with not only the apple slicer/corer, but also a mango slicer/corer, potato slicer and a garlic crusher. The quality is very nice, sturdy, sharp and easy to use. I like the fact that is comes with easy to grip handles that are very soft and makes cutting fairly easier. Since the blades are very sharp minimal effort is need to use. You can quickly and easily switched out the blades and go from evenly shaped apples to homemade french fries in a matter of seconds. I can't wait to try this out on sweet potatoes to make sweet potato fries. Overall a fantastic set that is a necessity for every kitchen. I received this product at a discount is exchange from my honest review.

Very nice tea. Definitely not the tea I am used to so I was excited to try this out. I absolutely love the tin it comes in and plan on reusing it. As for the tea, it has a wonderful smell and it taste great also. It was very light and refreshing and unlike most teas, not a lot of sugar was needed. I have never had loose tea before so brewing could be a little tricky. I used a tea infuser and that seemed to worked out great from me, but is not needed if you do not have one. The trick when making this tea is to not let the water get too hot. If the water gets too hot the tea will have a bitter taste, so don't fully boil your water or let it cool down a little if you do before steeping. Overall a great light and refreshing tea that would make a great gift for a tea lover. I received this item free in exchange for my honest review.

I absolutely love this mug. This is my favorite new cup that I have been using ever since I received it. So initially I bought this for my husband for beer, but it's too great to part with. I love how it keeps my coffee nice and hot by the time I get to drink it. The added lid makes a nice bouns and travel easier. Not only that, but it also kept my drinks cool with no ice even needed. Now the mug itself is a very nice quality with a sturdy grip handle. Cleaning up is also a breeze just a quick wash out and done no dishwasher required. Overall a fantastic mug that I can't get enough of. I received this item at a discount in exchange from my honest review.

Love this set! I am a huge essential oil lover and use them all the time as needed. This set is great for anyone into aromatherapy or a great starter set for a beginner.  The set was securely package upon and arrive and comes in a sturdy case for easy storage. In this set there are 6 10 ml oils Lavender, Peppermint, Tea Tree, Eucalyptus, Bergamot, and Lemongrass. There are so many great benefits to these oils and to have them all shipped together in one set is a great feature. Also provide is a free ebook with list of recipes and how to use each one properly. This set will come in handy for the winter months to come. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

Absolutely love this squeezer! I am a lemon lover and I use it on any and everything, so I was thrilled to receive this product. I was very surprised at the high quality and sturdiness of this squeezer. It really does a great job with getting all the juices out of the lemons. By far the best squeezer I have  ever tried. I can't wait to try this out on other citrus fruit. Definitely a must have for every kitchen. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

This product is very cool. I was excited to try this out and have fun with it. It works well and not difficult to use. Uploading is also a breeze. Great product. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

Great quality for an Ice cream scoop. Works smoothly and easy to clean and store away. I also used it to make meat balls and it worked with no problem. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

My first selfie stick and I love it. The Bluetooth feature is awesome and it connects easily. Once connected very easy to take pictures. Great quality and works very well. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

I really like this product. Been using it for a few days now and already notice a little change. Unlike most whitening kits, this one is very sensitive on teeth and gums which I love. Just be sure to only use a small amount as indicated so you won't burn your gums like I did the first time.  Overall a great product that I look forward to using longer for even better results. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

I really like this product. Been using it for a few days now and already notice a little change. Unlike most whitening kits, this one is very sensitive on teeth and gums which I love. Just be sure to only use a small amount as indicated so you won't burn your gums like I did the first time.  Overall a great product that I look forward to using longer for even better results. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

Great exercise for the entire family. Good quality and very easy to assemble. Small and light enough to move around and store away in a closet. You can workout while watching TV, reading, or even while working from your desk. Great product for multiple uses and for all ages. I am actually using mine right now as I write this review. My family and I totally enjoy this product and I look forward to getting many more uses out of it. I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

Very impressed with this headset for a brand I was unaware of. Quality and sound is great. Fits comfortably on everyone in my household of large heads. I tried on laptop and used with my IPhone with no problems. I also had my husband test them out on his PS4 and he was really impressed with them as well. Overall a great headset not only for gaming, but for other devices as well. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

Very impressed. Great quality and the design is really cute. It is compact so will fit in diaper bag, purse or even in the car. Definitely a must have product for moms and dads. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

Great quality. Very effective and works great. Easy to use, clean and store away. I look forward to using this product more in the future. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

Great product that gets things moving like it is intended. Great size for easy swallow. Also works pretty fast. No complaints overall a good product. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.

CoQ10 is a natural antioxidant and an important element that is found in the cells of the body. As you age, the body slows down production of CoQ10. This means that you will need a supplement  to keep CoQ10 in your body. CoQ10 is a natural antioxidant and  it fights the free radicals in your body to prevent oxidation reactions which can cause destruction of cells. Viva Labs CoQ10 is just the supplement to boost your body’s fight against free radicals.

I have heard of Glucosamine but never used it for joint pain until now.  My old body does have its share of aches and joint pain. I have noticed my joint pain is less after a week of taking the Glucosamine. The pills are really large and hard to swallow and that is the reason I gave it a 4 stars.

The picture does not do this jewelry set justice. It is a beautiful necklace with matching earrings. The pendant and each earring looks like a musical note to me. It is very dainty and exquisite looking. The chain of the necklace is 17 inches long, which is a little short for me and the earrings are for pierced ears. It is a lovely box jewelry gift set for any lady.

The cotton dishtowels from Dll are very fresh and bright looking. They are the perfect size for a quick wipe down of a spill.They are 100 % cotton and wash and dry easily.The colors are great for my kitchen. I ordered the pale green, orange, light blue and dark pink. I really do like DII products.

These black printed Damask kitchen towels are just too pretty to use. I have them hanging on the stove and on the pantry door. I think the black and white print is so fresh and bright looking. I just love these towels and they are definitely for show.

First thought is that the Samsung 64GB USB flash drive is very, very small. The being said, it is also very, very fast. I have a lot of pictures from lots of vacations and I was able to download over a thousand in a few minutes. It contains both a micro and a standard USB connection. It is water proof and magnetic proof. I might need that because I am forever DE-magnatizing key cards when I travel. It also includes a 5 year warranty. Samsung has done a good job on this Flash Drive and I highly recommend it.

This is the seventh in the Cedar Cove mystery series staring Kelly and her husband Mike. Kelly owns a coffee shop and Mike is the sheriff of Cedar Cove. They are on their postponed honeymoon. They attend a cooking school in Italy in a small town near Florence. The owner of the cooking school is murdered and Mike is asked by the chief of police to help with the investigation. Of course Kelly is willing to help all she can as well. It is a good mystery with several suspects and only one conclusion.

I really like the Wilson Jones binders, especially the ones with the cover page on the front and the spine. That makes it so much easier to identify the notebook and what it holds. The Wilson Jones binders have the 1 and 1/2 inch binders which can hold up to 330 sheets.

I really like the Wilson Jones binders, especially the ones with the cover page on the front and the spine. That makes it so much easier to identify the notebook and what it holds. The Wilson Jones binders have the 1 and 1/2 inch binders which can hold up to 330 sheets.

This is a fun card game for children six and up. It has over 60 large illustrated cards. The train is an animal train and the idea is to  match the train that has your card’s color. The child with the most cards wins. The Moose in the Caboose is a wild card and when he show up, you get to collect all of the card at the end of the train. It is a lot of fun to play and children will love it.
I delete this game from my Kindle Fire because of all the ads that were on the screen.

I traded in my Kindle keyboard for the new Kindle Fire 7". It is so different from the Kindle, I really love the size, the programs in color and the touch screen. The price is so reasonable and the Fire really is a great tablet. I highly recommend it.

This is the first book in the Burnside series. Private Investigator Burnside has two clients. One is the insurance company trying to prove a lady was not injured in a car accident. He was hired for the other case by Norman Freeman. Norman was driving his brother's car and someone shot out the window. Norman thinks they were after his brother Robbie. Burnside takes the case and goes to a bachelor party for Norman that Robbie is having. Robbie ends up dead and the police rule it a suicide. Burnside is not convinced and the story begins. It is a good mystery and I recommend it.

The characters of Rose Hill are fast becoming my favorite characters. This is the fourth book in the series and it continues the story of the families who grew up in Rose Hill. Scott Campbell is the sheriff of the small town and has only two deputies to help him. Carrie Fitzpatrick returns to Rose Hill after 20 years in the Hollywood scene and plans to stay just long enough to get her parents settled, then she will leave again. It is a poignant story about the children of aging parents and how they will react to disabling disease, dementia, and frail health of their parents. There is a hit and run that needs to be solved and Carrie's former boss has come to Rose Hill to bully her into returning to work. All in all it is just another day in Rose Hill. I highly recommend ti.

The NuPro Fire Standing Case fits the new Fire ($49) Kindle. I just received my Fire Kindle and was amazed to see this standing case available. It is a beautiful purple color  (I can spot my Kindle in any room) and it really stands alone with the Kindle. The case is made of  durable polyurethane and it is designed to protect your Fire Kindle 5th Generation - 2015 release. There is a magnetic closure that  keeps the cover  shut.The built-in stand allows the Kindle Fire to stand in the  landscape orientation. I recommend this case for any new Kindle Fire owner.

I love the Hefty Slider Freezer bags. I put my hamburger patties in them for freezing. I use them for everyday storage as well as for frozen items. The bags are easy to open the slide lock and just as easy to close the bags. I depend on Hefty for my storage bags and these are perfect for the smaller items that I need to freeze or keep fresh.

This is my second order of the Fruit Of The Loom flexible fit hipsters. I was so impressed with the first set, that I had to order a second set. The fit  is perfect for days when you need a little wiggle room. These panties feature a tag free design, super soft cotton stretch and ribbed side panels that stretch to fit your shape. The women's hipster pantie silhouette fits  slightly above the hips and offers moderate seat coverage. With colors that range from black to white, there is enough variety for day to day wear.I really think Fruit of the Loom is on to something with the stretch sides.

With the new movie coming out about the Good Dinosaur, Butch the T-Rex is a great gift for any child. He talks with sounds and  roars just like Butch when you move his arms and his feet gallop when you hold his tail. He does not actually walk or run, but he is fun to watch. He is just right for children ages 3 to 5. He is 18 inches tall so he is a monster among dinosaurs.

I am so impressed with the workmanship of the Queen Support Foundation It is a replacement for a full size bed frame in my guest bed room. The Ashley M86X32 is an amazing piece of workmanship. The foundation took only 30 minutes  for my daughter and me to set it up and it looks great in the guest bedroom. It is so well mad, the corner risers have velcro on them so the cover will fit snugly on the frame. It should last a long time. I set it up, put a new queen size box spring and mattress on it and now I have a new bed for my guests. It is very easy to set up and I highly recommend this for any bed or replacement for any bed support.
Once again Carrie Underwood has a hit album on her hands. This is great country music at its best. I love Carrie and I love this album. I highly recommend it.

This is my third cat tree by Iris. I have one in the living room and two in the rec room. They do a great job of creating an indoor habitat that my seven rescue cats love.This cat tree is well built, has 4 tiers with a hide-away, a swing, a hammock, scratching posts, perches and climbing steps. This tree took me about an hour to put together. The instructions are very basic, with pictures instead of instructions. I put furniture sliders on the bottom of this cat tree so I can easily move it from place to place. The cats love it. I sprinkled a little cat nip on the perches to get them interested and they did the rest.

I love purple and this Gaiam Kids Yoga Backpack is a beautiful purple. It is the perfect size for any child even if they don't do Yoga. It has a zippered pocket on the front and a longer open pocket on the front, with a draw string for closure. The top is also a drawstring closure with the drawstrings making up the backpack straps. The inside has room enough to carry Yoga mats and towels. The Gaiam Kids Yoga Backpack is well made and should last a long time. I highly recommend it.

I haven’t had an electric blanket since the 1990’s and I really have missed it. I like to turn the thermostat down in the evening to save electricity, but I don’t like to pile covers on my bed to keep warm. I enjoy a warm bed, so I turn on the blanket about 10 minutes before I go to bed and the Serta preheat warms the bed very fast. I only use one control for my bed, but it works for me. The blanket is very soft and such a pretty color of light beige. The instructions are very easy to follow. Just hook up the blanket connection to the power cord and then to an outlet. It is probably best to work the power cord under the mattress and have the blanket connection at the end of the bed. Then have the power controller on your bedside table. The controls are simple, turn the power on and then decide which heat setting you want and how long you want the heat to stay on. Works like a charm!
Very sweet story about a small town who went to the big city and made it big, but decided to come back home way from the bright lights of the modeling world. Nice romance!

Colorful briefs that fit perfectly. They are cotton stretch with actual stretch side panels that stretch to fit the shape. It is hard to find  large sizes in a soft cotton and these are super soft. I though the waist might be too low, but I love the waist band and “no tag” features. There are 4 briefs in a package and the colors vary with  two pink shades and two brown shades. I am very pleased with this order and plan to order more as needed.

I am all for making my rescue cats happy indoors. This is my second cat tree from the IRIS company. They do a great job of creating an indoor habitat that cats love.This cat tree has 7 tiers from floor to ceiling with lots of hide-a ways, dangling rope, scratching posts, perches and climbing steps. It take two people to put it together easily and ready in about an hour. My cats love it. They always head for the highest perch so they can watch me work. I sprinkled a little cat nip on the perches to get them interested and they did the rest.

I am writing this review after using the illuminage hair reduction system for a week. It is touted as proven to be effective in permanently reducing hair growth after just 3 months of treatment. I will finish the review in 3 months. I followed the directions and actually shaved my legs and underarms before the treatment. This is done so the system focuses on the hair follicles beneath the surface, rather than on present hair.  The treatment is very simple, you place the applicator on your skin so that the two silver contact bars are in contact with the skin. The applicator will emit abright white light as you move slowly over the skin. If there is no bright white light, the contact bars are not in contact with the skin. I admit the bright light was somewhat scary, but it does not make the skin warm, and is over in a second. Once I got use to it, I was able to glide the applicator over my legs, moving the applicator after each flash. I repeated the process two more times. Do not hold the applicator over one area of skin and flash multiple times. This may cause injury to the skin. The applicator is very safe, it will turn itself off if it is not in use for 30 seconds. You can also use the illuminate touch on your face, just follow the directions.

Huge Transformers Robot Bumblebee Car toy! This toy is gigantic - it measures nearly 20 inches tall! There are flashing lights and it has a total of 15 different sounds and phrases. Converts from gigantic robot into super sports car in just 3 easy steps. This is a really fun and entertaining toy. I am no expert on Transformers or plastic, for that matter, but I do know this is a fun and really cool toy. It is for ages 6 and older and I am impressed that it comes with an app that kids can download, scan the toy shield to unlock content and play fun games on any iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and some other Android devices. I think this adds a great digital bonus to the toy and will expand kids imagination. I can't compare it to previous Transformers toys because I am not familiar with them, but I do love the sheer size of this Robot/Car. It is impressive and very detailed. It will keep kids entertained since they can use it as a Robot and then transform it into the sports car and race around with it - very fun!

This is just what my seven rescue cats needed. The Current Pet Fountain keeps the water circulating with a very quiet pump. The cats hardly noticed that the fountain has a small ripple. Some of my cats like to drink running water, so this fountain is perfect for them. The fountain is large enough for all of them to get water during the day. The water in the smaller bowls disappear fast. I highly  recommend this pet fountain for all pet lovers.
I love all things about the Royal Family and the Royal Wedding was such a beautiful DVD. I highly recommend it for all Royal Family lovers.

Dev Haskell is a Private Investigator. His "girl friend" is Maddie and she has a dog named Morton. Maddie has to leave Morton with Dev when her father has a heart attack. She is gone for several days and in those days, Dev manages to teach Morton all the bad tricks that a dog should never learn. There is a mob gangster, a dog show with a Princess dog involved, a couple of beatings and several car chases. When Maddie returns she has bad news for Dev and he is realizes he misses Morton more than Maddie

I have always wanted to try a double need in my machine and now my Singer use the double needle. These needles are well made and sturdy. They come in three different sizes which suits me just fine. I will use them for borders and hemming skirts and tops. They make the hemming job a lot easier.

This is a really nice Lenox extra wide spoon rest in the Holiday pattern with holly berries. It is almost 9 inches long and just shy of 5 inches wide - a great extra wide size large enough for a soup ladle or other large spoons. I plan on using this when my son and daughter-in-law come to stay with me during the holidays. It looks really pretty on my white stove top. It is microwave and dishwasher safe and embodies the quality that I have come to expect from the Lenox brand.

Great top for yoga also looks great with jeans too! This Gaiam top is really soft and fits well. The seams are flat so there is no itching and it wicks away sweat. It is cut in a very flattering design - nice wide neckline and longer in the back with a mesh (sheer but not totally see-through) panel in the back that is kinda cool. It is made from tencel and cotton with just the right touch of spandex for stretchiness. The sleeves are a little long but they are gathered at the wrist so they don't flop down on your hand. This top is good for layering since it lays flat and is very slimming. The grey color is a good neutral and goes with everything!

This is a cute little book to get little ones (ages 6- 12 months) started on the road to reading and loving books. It is really soft and has fun shapes and bright colors. It is the perfect size for little hands to hold onto and each page has a different number and correlated graphic to match that number. There is a separate push button piece that has sound and when pushed states the number and the "fruit" associated with it. It is probably for parents to use at first and then as the child gets older they will be able to recognize that with their "action" of pushing the ball they get to hear the phrase. This helps in development of learning skills and action and reaction. Also, the pieces of fruit or veggies each have a different touchy feel or sound to them (crinkly, soft, embroidered, etc.) to keep the child's attention. There is also a page with a mirror which is always fun for kids.
This book was about Millie who has a list of what she wants in a man. I could not get into the book.

Three Sisters is the first in a series of Emily Castles mysteries. It is a British mystery and Emily really seems like a shy mouse at first. She is invited to a neighborhood party and she really is not sure she was invited or that she should attend. On the way she meets Dr. Muriel who is her neighbor as well. It was a confusing story about the three sisters and who was murdered. I was confused during the entire story.

I love boxed sets because they are such a bargain. This boxed set is set at Christmas time and I love Christmas. Two of my favorite things. The books are by different authors and different characters, so each book is a stand alone. I really enjoyed this set and highly recommend it to all romance lovers.

Jack Stratton is a police detective with a captain who does not appreciate Jack's abilities. In fact he has Jack walking a beat for punishment. Marisa is a beautiful girl and she is kidnapped under Jack's watch. No one will believe she didn't just run away. In the end, Jack realizes he cannot trust anyone if he is to find Marisa safe and sound. It was an OK book.

This my first book by Brigid George. Dusty Kent is the star, but the book is narrated by Sean O'Kelly. Murloo is in Australia and Sean is a world traveler from Ireland. He has come to Australia to work a while until he is ready to move on. Dusty Kent is an author and she has written one book that actually solved a cold case. She is determined to write another book dealing with a year old case in Murloo. Gabby Peter was murdered in her home one year ago and the murdered was never caught. Dusty is determined to find the killer. When she learns that Seah is an IT guy, maze master, she calls him, she hires him to help with the computer details. Together they interview, probe, question and in general get in the way of the police. The outcome will be surprising. It is a very good mystery.

This is the third book staring  Paige Mackenzie ,a  journalist for the Manhattan Post, that I have read by Deborah Garner. Paige has the good fortune to be assigned jobs that send her to various parts of the United States. The first two books sent her to Jackson Hole, Wyoming where she met her cowboy Jake. She was able to help Jake in the second book look for a lost treasure. In this book she is assigned to a spa in Tres Palomas, New Mexico which has mineral pools which seem to rejuvenate the body and heal. While there Paige again finds a mystery that needs solving. The Three Doves are symbols on pieces of jewelry made by the lovely Anna daughter of the owner of the spa. The jewelry is being counterfeited and sold at a much lesser price. Paige tries to find the culprit and Jake finds her. The book was very hard to put down. It is a good mystery.

TY Beanie Boos Friends is a board game that is fun and cute but please do not be misled- it does NOT include the stuffed plush animals. They are featured on the game pieces that you use to play this simple (for ages 3-6) board game and the box clearly states in small print on the back "Plush toys not included." This game reminds me a bit of the game Memory. You roll one die (included) to make moves around the game board. Each player has to collect the different shaped color tiles for the Beanie Boo Friends character that you are "playing for" to help Peanut the Elephant find all of his "plushie" friends-the characters that is, not the actual plush toys. The first player to collect all of that character's shapes wins the game. There are also some cute stickers. All in all a fun little game to help little ones with memorization and learning colors and shapes.

We have been through the trials of all different kinds of food to keep our pets healthy, address urinary issues, and find something they actually like to eat! Solid Gold meets all of our criteria and then some. First off, dogs love the taste and the smell. A biggy when introducing any new food. I like the fact that the kibble pieces are small and easily digestible. And the ingredient list makes this pet mom very happy - oatmeal, barley and ocean fish meal are listed 1st and fish meal is a nice tasty protein that they all enjoy, and also eggs for muscle growth, dried kelp, Taurine for heart health and L-Carnittine to help burn fat, a necessary ingredient when you are dealing with dogs of all different shapes and sizes with varying levels of activity and ages. I really love that there are no fillers, no artificial colors or artificial flavors-thank you! And there is prebiotic fiber to help with digestion issues and vitamins and omega fatty acids to help with skin and coat health and immune system functions. Solid Gold is a big hit with dogs and that is really saying something! As for the cost, I have paid similar prices for food from the vet and then they didn't like it so I think if they love it I will pay to find the right healthy food.

Kira is a great large size, 13 inches approx., with a lot of neat features that make learning fun for little ones of all ages. She is soft and cuddly and a nice size for kids to cuddle with and hold onto as they play. Kira is also very interactive - when you press on each paw and her heart - it will activate a song, or giggles or a learning phrase - very cute. It is part of the First Steps collection by Shakira and it is a really fun toy! Kira speaks and sings in both English and Spanish which is a really nice added feature and so helpful since kids learn new languages best at a young age. There are over 30 songs in both languages and also phrases for learning the alphabet (ABCs), numbers, colors and a totally unexpected bonus-manners! This soft kitty will entertain and soothe little ones while also teaching them important first skills.

So pleased with this Epson Expression Photo XP-960! Our family takes and prints a lot of photos and we were on the lookout for the best home printer. This "small-in-one" was a breeze to set up and impressed us right out of the gate. I love that it is wireless and we can each print from our various iPads, smartphones and other mobile devices with router-free printing. The quality of the photos is the best I have seen - image quality is clean with no dropletting as with some other brands we've tried and the colors are crisp and bright. I really love this printer! It has photo auto-correction which is great and red-eye removal which is a must! The printing speed is impressive, as little as 11 seconds for the 4X6 inch size. You can also easily share photos by scanning them to Facebook and the cloud. I especially like the fold-over lid which holds your original copy in place as it scans. Its a nice touch that is much appreciated. As others have noted I would only use this for photo printing due to the cost of the 6 color ultra HD ink cartridges. If you do want to use it for a regular everyday printer, the ISO print speed (pages per minute) is 8.5 for black and white and 8.0 for color in the single-side mode. Overall a very professional quality printer with wonderful image resolution and crispness!

This doll is so fun! This Snackin' Sara Baby Alive doll is a great size , I think she is 14 inches tall, just what little ones love to hold onto. The best part is that she speaks! I haven't heard all of them but there are some 30 different phrases in both English and Spanish, and that will come in handy. Snackin Sara also comes with reusable food to feed her and a little diaper. Too cute! Little ones will have so much fun carrying this doll around, playing with her, feeding her and changing her diaper. This Baby Alive doll would be a great "teaching" doll for a future big sister or brother to practice caring for a new little one, all while learning Spanish too!

We have a multi-cat household and have been through the trials of all different kinds of cat food to keep them healthy, address urinary issues, and find something they actually like to eat! Solid Gold meets all of our criteria and then some. First off, all of my cats love this stuff! They love the taste and the smell. They come running when I put this in their bowls - usually they take their time and act disinterested in food if it doesn't meet their smell test. I like the fact that the kibble pieces are really small and easily digestible. With other large kibble they tend to make a mess and crunch it and pieces get left on the floor. Not with Solid Gold- they devoured every little scrumptious morsel. And the ingredient list makes this cat mom very happy - chicken is 1st and that is a nice mild protein that they all enjoy, and cranberries to help with urinary issues (just like for humans) and also Taurine for heart health and L-Carnittine to help burn fat, a necessary ingredient when you are dealing with cats of all different shapes and sizes with varying levels of activity and ages. Solid Gold is a big hit with all of my cats and that is really saying something! As for the cost, I have paid similar prices for food from the vet and then the cats didn't like it so I think if they love it I will pay to find the right healthy food for them and this is it.

This Swiss Legend women's watch is very beautiful and yes , the clasp is complete and utter weirdness! I will admit that it took me a few tries to get this watch on. But once I did, it really was special. The mother-of-pearl dial with the rose gold tone stainless steel bezel is very striking and the watch has lots of bells and whistles. However, the actual watchband is silicone which is very rubbery and that is why I gave it 4 stars. I guess this is the style these days but I prefer a nice leather band on my watches. This watch is a beautiful piece of quality craftsmanship and true watch aficionados will appreciate all of its qualities.

This 11 piece shaving set is perfect for the guy who likes to have a beard but doesn't want to spend a lot of time and money on grooming. I got this for my son who lives overseas, so he could use it when he visits me. It is handy and lightweight but gets the job done. He really likes the nose, ear and eyebrow hair trimmer attachment too.  It uses a lithium battery and the charge lasts for 3 hours. All of the 11 pieces fit neatly into a zippered case which is included, so it is a great grooming kit for travel as well. Since it is 100% waterproof, it may be used in the shower also which is a real plus for guys on the go!

This is a class act seam ripper. I  have bought the cheap seam rippers only to have them get dull after use. This seam ripper has the right weight to it and feels great in my hand. I really like the tiny ring on the end of the top. I have been able to hook the seam ripper to a lanyard so that I can keep it close and never lose it.

I have a Vitamin D deficiency and have to take 4000 IU of Vitamin D3 every day, plus 50,000 IU once a week. This measurement of 5000 IU is perfect for me to take and get more Vitamin D3 every day.  I am glad that it comes in this convenient size and it is very easy to swallow. I recommend this Vitamin D3 5000 IU softgel for your Vitamin D needs.

Ten years ago Lizzie Coleman had loved and lost Steve Larson. Now on Christmas Eve she meets up with him again and they both feel the same way about each other. That should be the end of the story, but it takes a twist. Steve is accused of assault and arrested just days before their marriage. Lizzie is doing her best to prove Steve's innocence, but it seems an impossible job. This is a good love story.

A Matter of Trust deals with Cat Taylor who is getting over a bad marriage and trying to start over far away from her ex. She wants to take charge of her life and decides to learn to take flying lessons because she is afraid of flying. Her instructor is good lookin Josh Buchannan and he pegs Cat as a groupie who like pilots. She and he clash with each lesson. On their final flight, they crash land in the mountains and Cat has to depend on Josh to get them out alive. Josh realizes the crash was no accident and the killers are still after them. They hide in a logger's cabin and have to run for their lives when it bursts into flames. The book is well written and a good read.

What a sweet blue Topaz necklace. It looks so pretty on and I get compliments when I wear it. Any woman would love to wear this beautiful necklace. There are three stones that range from small and the top to large at the bottom.I would rank the color as sky blue Topaz. It is not my birthstone, but it is pretty enough to wear every day.

I love a boxed set because it is such a bargain for so many books. The Sweet Christmas Kisses 2 is a bargain of 19 romantic novels by some of my favorite authors. I love Christmas novels and usually try to get one or two sets each Christmas. I am getting into this boxed set a little early, but Christmas is not too far away. Love the boxed sets

This is a great book about the National Parks with beautiful pictures to match. It is well written, with a chapter on each National Park (30 in all).Each chapter has spectacular photos of attractions, information about the weather (best time to visit), entrance fees, hours, and even phone numbers and addresses. There are must see sites, which detail the site and includes pictures. It has so much information packed into each chapter that you will be glad you have this Kindle version with you on your device.

This book is set in the Hollywood region. The female detective, Kate Sexton, meets her new partner Harvey Gluck at a crime scene. Harvey has a condition that makes him puke when he sees a dead body. He also is a want-to-be-actor. Only in Hollywood, right. For me the book goes downhill after that. It is an OK read, but not for me.
I know the Biblical story of David and Bathsheba and this is a continuation of that relationship up until David is on his death bed. It is an OK book, but not what I was interested in.
These bobbins are not Class 15 bobbins. I cannot use them in my Singer Embroidery machine.

Morning Glory Circle is the second in the Mystery series about the town of Rose Hill. Chief of Police, Scott Gordon has forced Margie Estep, the postmistress of Rose Hill,to resign because she has been tampering with the mail. He found out that she has been taking people's mail, throwing it away or delaying the deliver. She even falsified evidence that put a man in prison. When she was forced to leave the Post Office, she decided to blackmail townspeople with information she knew from the mail and from walking the streets of Rose Hill at night. She goes to far and is murdered and her body left in the snow. The body is not found for two days and the clues are very cold. Scott and his girl friend Maggie Fitzpatrick have their work cut out for them, because no body liked Margie but her mother. It is a fascinating book and you will get addicted to the Rose Hill mystery series. I know I am ready to download the next in the series, Iris Avenue.

This is toilet paper folks. I ordered it because it is advertised as Ultra Plush and I really like a soft bath tissue.I have heard of the core-less  rolls and wanted to try them. I always recycle the paper tube from the roll, so I cannot see much advantage to a core-less roll. The rolls are much smaller than average due to the missing tube and will pack in a smaller place. When you place the roll on the toilet tissue holder, it fluffs out and looks just like a regular roll. It is a neat idea and I hope it will make the toilet tissue cheaper instead of more expensive. When the roll is almost finished, all the paper comes off with one pull. That leaves you with too much paper for one wipe.

I thought this would be a fun mix, since it has premium ingredients. The blend of the lime and orange flavors do mix together nicely. I prefer the virgin cocktail, so I added ginger ale to my can. It makes a perfect tangy, refreshing drink. Each can is the correct size for making a single drink. It is very convenient to use and serve. It is such a neat idea for making Margaritas.

I have to say that the first thing my daughter said when she saw these gloves was, "They're purple!" I worked in a medical laboratory until I retired and used the powder free gloves every day.The Ammex Nitrile glove is Latex free and great for either industrial jobs or any home job you have and will keep your hands clean and dry. I plan to use them when I dye my hair (the gloves that come with the boxed hair color are not very good) , when I am scrap-booking to keep the glue off my hands, painting and any other crafts.. They are easy to pull on and the large size is perfect for my hands

I was surprised to find a 10 pack of universal sewing machine needles for such a reasonable price. The needle sizes range from 10 for knits to 14 for heavy duty sewing. I really appreciate the handy plastic case the needles came in with their size printed on the bottom. That is a great way to keep up with the needle you are using.

The Kai 5135 embroidery scissors are perfect for any embroidery project. They are very sharp and can nip any jump stitch or trim an applique. The handle are soft and very easy to hold. My embroidery teacher recommended the Kai brand and I am so glad found them on Amazon.  My mom always told me never to cut anything but fabric with my sewing scissors and I have several good scissors, but these are now my favorite pair of scissors.

This is my second order for the Swaddle Me 3 Pack Muslin Blankets so you know I love them. There are 3 Swaddle Me Muslin blankets, one is white with tiny grey anchors, one is soft grey and one is soft green striped. The blankets are soft cotton muslin and wash easily. The muslin is lightweight and breathable for the baby’s comfort.  There are directions which show you how to swaddle the baby in the blanket. The advantages of swaddling is: it teaches the baby to sleep through the night, it reduces loose bedding in the crib and keeps the baby sleeping safely on their backs. These make great baby shower gifts.

The main character is Belinda a young lady who lives in Poetry, Texas. She takes it upon herself to answer a young lady, Corabelle from New York, who put an ad in the paper for a new life in the west. She has a certain barber in mind for Miss Corabelle, but when she arrives, Belinda's brother wins Corabelle's heart instead of George. The more matches she makes, the worse the matches get. True one or two really fall in love, but the rest hate each other and go off in Poetry to find a new love. Belinda is somewhat like Emma in Jane Austen's book. The results are funny and it makes a good read.

I really like the character of Dr. Genevieve (Jenny) Lenard. She is brilliant, she works for an insurance company finding fraud, she has Autism, but she still functions in a "normal" wold. She is asked by her boss to help Interpol discover why a young artist was murdered by a Russian. The plot is very complex, but the author does a wonderful job keeping your interest. Dr. Lenard is also approached by a criminal who also wants to know who killed the unknown artist. When all the facts are presented and there are many, many facts (Jenny has three computers at work and several at home), the identity of the mastermind (Red) will surprise you. I could not put this book down. I found the characters very interesting and exciting. I highly recommend this mystery/thriller.

Seductive Secrets is a novel set in the 1850'S and is about a young lady Alyce Rufford. Alyce has been sent for by her guardian and she is traveling with her aunt and uncle to London. They have to stop on the way because the aunt gets sick. During the stay, someone tries to kill Alyce in her room. She is saved by Lord Julian Casvelyn. Julian is the grandson of Alyce's guardian, but neither know that. Alyce is in danger and Lord Julian makes sure she is protected. When she is kidnapped by a terrible man, Julian has to search for her. It is an interesting story and I recommend it to mystery lovers and romance lovers.

I am not a hiker, but I do like to walk. My son and I take three to five mile walks when he visits me and I usually get him to carry my water. Now I will not have to do that with the Access 20 Plus belt. I like the zipper pockets for my phone and keys. The water  bottle is easy to get to in the bottle cage. I also like the small bottle for my hand sanitizer. That is a great idea. I highly recommend this belt for all hikers and walkers.

The novel is a work of alternate history and takes place around 50 AD. Heron is a "miracle worker" in Alexandria, Egypt. Heron is really a woman posing as her dead brother in hopes of paying off his gambling debts. Heron actulaly lived in Alexandria and was know for his inventions such as the aeolipile, the oracle machines,wind turbines, clockwork plays, was machines and other inventions that were passed off as miracles in the temples. Agog is a Northman who comes to Alexandria to find the great Heron and pay him to make war machines for him to defeat the Romans and run them out of Alexandria. The story story is very well researched and goes into detail about the many inventions that Heron is able to build. I highly recommend this book to mystery and history buffs.

I do not camp out, and i don't know much about sleeping bags,but I ordered this sleeping bag as a backup when the power goes out in the winter. I have been without power for several days and the Jenny 20 degree sleeping bag is just what I need to keep me warm and toasty.I am 5'10" and it was perfect size for me. It is very comfortable and easy to get into and out of. It is not too heavy and really soft for sleeping. The outer shells is a lovely burgundy color and it has a handy bag for toting the Slumbersoft sleeping bag. Our youth group at church has sleepovers at the church and I will also offer this to any child that does not have a sleeping bag.

This was recommended to me by a fellow traveler on a recent trip. I need to take it with me for my trip next month. I have tried it in my home and it works, if only I can remember to spray it first. Now I will try it in a motel room and see how it works.  The Rose Geranium smell is not overpowering and I think it does a good job.

The cradle sheet is a beautiful soft blue color and made of  100% cotton jersey material which makes it feel so soft. I don’t have a cradle, but it fits the baby travel bed that I have and a flat changing table pad. It washes up great in cold water and I highly recommend it for any new mom.
This book takes place in the South just before the Civil War. Be warned there is no ending, just a promise of 3 more books to read before the story is finished. I don't like this type of serial.

The owner of the Roasted Love, Jacob is accused of murdering his competition, Michael Simms. His barista, Laila decides to clear Jacob's name. She gets a cute paramedic Daniel to help her find the real killer of Michael and get Jacob out of jail. I was surprised at the identity of the killer. This is a real page turner and all mystery lovers will enjoy it.

This thriller by Patricia Clark is about a serial killer who is going around DC and then other US cities killing lawyers by sticking them with a deadly poison. At first the deaths seem to be heart attacks, but increased investigation turns up puncture marks on the victims and suspected poisoning. Detective Pulaski of the DC police asks for help from the FBI and Shawn Cleary is assigned the case. She is an agent who is blames herself for her partner Trevor being paralyzed in a shoot out. She recruits Trevor on the case to do technical investigations. The real killer surprised me completely.  This book is a real page turner and I highly recommend it to all mystery lovers.

Oh my what a program. The star is a new recruit for the CIA. She hasn't even finished her training before she is called to DC for a job. She is a real wacko and she has very unusual methods of getting things done, even it is not conventional. I really like the hero and plan to continue watching this series.
This is the first time I have watched The Glades and I really liked the characters and the Florida Everglades Locale. I plan to continue watching this great series.

I worked in a medical laboratory until I retired and used the powder free gloves every day.The Ammex disposable gloves are great for industrial jobs or any home job you have and will keep your hands clean and dry. I plan to use them when I dye my hair (the gloves that come with the boxed hair color are not very good) and when I am scrapebooking to keep the glue off my hands. I highly recommend these gloves from a professional viewpoint.

This appears to be a better idea than an actual cooking necessity. I will say I like the bottle option of storing sauce and simply swapping out for the basting top, but other than that... I can't think of any good reason why I would prefer this over a basting brush and a bowl o' sauce. It's not high quality (and I like Cuisinart's products) and as others have pointed out, this is only useful for thin sauces. The basting brush head is respectable, but I find myself scratching my head over when I'll be using this.

I selected this in hopes of using it with my second grade class, and I got to say this is meant for a slightly older age group--and those kids will have an absolute blast with this incredibly fun book. This makes good on its promise to help the willing reader create a country with all the basic essentials... and goes further with secretly teaching kids about governments and cultures. It's easy to understand and is accessible, quickly drawing in kids to participate. Great fun.

Well, heck, but what a classy-looking ring! This is a great-looking piece of jewelry that uses style to look so much more valuable than rhodium and zirconium. The black-and-white design is stunning, as is the choice to continue the pattern all the way around. As another reviewer mentioned, this is a ring just begging to be stacked. Very pleased with this beauty.

I love it when a book aims for those old-fashioned bits of nostalgia. Here, we head for a freak show type of place with all the presence and aura such a thing provides. All in good fun, of course, making this a promise of enchantment for the middle reader. I myself was quite enchanted. It's a fun and quirky series debut that still manages to be thoughtful and meaningful - great balance.

I found myself referring to my husband about this surprisingly gruesome children's novel. Yeah,  this book is that awesome for a reader up for some proper nautical adventure. The story has a classic feel with the right balance between historical adventure and fantasy with enough nastiness thrown in for excitement. Adventure lovers will eat this up, as will the lovers of a good bit of lore with the emphasis on Chinese mythology and Marco Polo legends. Top-notch storytelling and writing really makes this special.

I'm a big fan if Hyland ' s baby lune and this does not disappoint. If you're up for a homeopathic treatment this is a nice addition to the teething and mouth discomfort arsenal. The consistency makes application easy and the long-term effects are great.

Despite a pooping infant, I think this is just going to become a regular garbage can where it can do its job of containing trash less smelly than diapers.Because I can't see anything superior about this in the diaper pail world. I use a stainless steel diaper pail by Ubbi that is great for odors and this one doesn't compare. I put this on the same aroma standard as my old cheap plastic one I now use for dish rags. Good, but hardly the king of odor-blocking. Plus, for the price this one isn't that well-made.The good is that it's decent at its purpose. I don't want to call this a lousy diaper pail.  And it's really quite attractive which is why it's going the trash can route of life. It holds a lot (another win for trash can) which I dont know is the best desire for stinky diapers. I say get 'em out regularly.In the end, it's really just a fancy trash can. No super odor protection as I expected.

Well, this originally terrified my toddler, the one whose bath tub stunts were the reason we wanted a bath mat. But the big bubbles of non-slip wonder eventually worked their way to her. I'd say we are generally pleased with this mat. It's thick, covers a good amount of the tub, and has sealed itself down respectably. It's not quite as big as some might like, but certainly nice.

If you're looking for something all unapologetically Christmas and of gorgeous quality, this is a beautiful and quality holiday piece. The red and green florist make it full of holiday spirit while also classy. The plate and shakers are sturdy, nothing cheap - like. Now I'm excited for the holidays.

This is a rather cute and heartfelt collection of Hallmark jewelry with a great look. Here is a heart theme for those desiring sweetness with a lovely choice of stones and nice round hearts. The band is comfortable, a nice medium thickness, covered with its own line of sparkles. A sweetheart ring to be sure.

I can't help but expect more from a Kitchen Aid product. This is a hefty piece of can opening gadgetry but comes off as more impressive in look than performance. That isn't too say this does not do a fine job, but it's not perfect and I can name a few cheaper brands that also do a similar job. There is a tendency to slip on its grip that I wish wasn't happening. Nothing too much and certainly decent, but not the perfection I hoped for.

It's good to find a trilogy that gets better as it goes along, and in my humble opinion the Fianna Trilogy did just that. The first book was a nice little fantasy romance that properly filled the niche, I further enjoyed the second, and this last installment really had me reading! Our reluctant heroine Grace becomes much less reluctant and more up to filling her duty as the veleda, even giving in to Druid training with a rather strange and ruthless teacher. And, as the series has promised, the terror of her choice at Samhain looms closer and both sides try to find Grace.
