Eight words to describe Theresa: Poised, compassionate, smart, ambitious, loyal, gutsy, restless and graceful.“I trusted him to protect me, but not to protect himself for my sake?”Rule blew me away with its intensity and complexity.  It’s full circle on so many levels I am utterly speechless.  It offers the very best of sex, danger, intrigue, angst and suspense. Be prepared not to get everything wrapped in a pretty bow, yet the ending was all them, full circle, songs of perfection.Effortless storytelling!  Breathtaking plot!  Intense sex scenes!  Larger-than-life Antonio Spinelli!  Brilliant ending!  Epic saga!“Yet I sat on a throne before a kingdom of possibilities.”***Hero rating: 5+ starsHeroine rating: 4 starsSexual tension rating: 5 starsSex scenes rating: 5 starsSex scenes frequency: 5 starsPlot rating: 5 starsDialogue rating: 5 starsStorytelling rating: 5 starsStory ending rating: 4.5 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): N/A************************************************Overall rating: 5 starsWould I recommend this series: Yes.Would I re-read this series: Yes.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.A gifted copy was provided by author/publisher for an honest review.

Sugar Baby Beautiful (stand-alone) opens up to waitress and call center operator Felicity Harper being coerced into attending a Sugar Baby party in the Hollywood Hills.  Her two gold-digger friends and roommates, Mark an Cleo have reaped the benefits of such arrangements for years while Felicity struggles to make ends meet.  At the party she makes the best of her night by finding the mansion’s music room and playing the grand piano.Hollywood producer, director and writer, heir to a fortune and Hollywood royalty Theodore J. Darcy, Theo hears Felicity play and is mesmerized.  He has come to break up the party annoyed with his brother for opening up his home to gold diggers.Theo is intrigued by the young musical genius despite meeting her at such a party.  He pursues her relentlessly and they agree to no-questions-asked sex.  Felicity is swept off her feet in a blockbuster romance and sex-scapades with the larger-than life and infamous Theo.  But she does not want a long-term relationship, more on why to unfold, and so she sets a cap on their time together.While they are both consumed by their intense attraction, sexual needs and chemistry the inevitably deadline, is creeping in.  Like any good movie their picture-perfect arrangement must have an end, but not before the culmination and climax produces secrets, lies, deceit, heartbreak and more…THEODORE J. DARCY, Theo:  31 years/$$$$/Heir/CEO/Director/Writer/Producer/Black hair/Green eyes/6’3”.I’m still pining after Theodore J. Darcy, Theo. In fact I am creating a new alpha hero shelf for him.  He is the in-control EASY-GOING alpha.  Never for a second did I doubt his imposing presence and commanding ways, but his laid-back personality lets Felicity have free reigns.  That said as he was falling I sensed his need to not so much possess her but to make her his.“Sometimes it felt like he was taking out his frustration with me on my body, while other times when he was gentle with me it felt like he was asking me why.”FELICITY HARPER:  24 years/Waitress/Call center/Honey-brown hair/Hazel eyes/5’9”.Felicity Harper is another strong heroine courtesy J.J. McAvoy and kudos for creating another such unique heroine.  As strong as swoon-worthy as Theo was, Felicity always held her own and in many ways she controlled the development of their relationship or rather her stubbornness and fears did - until Theo took charge.“So I do what I do best and try to run.  But he’s a runner so he so he always catches up to me.”Sugar Baby Beautiful with its thought-provoking plot is every bit the rollercoaster romance the setting calls for, all the way through the shocking second/third act and Hollywood ending.  Lights - Camera –Action!Spellbinding plot!  Effortless story telling!  Soul-searching passion!  Larger-than-life, easy-going alpha hero!  Captivating, I-want-to-be-her heroine!  6-stars shelf.***Hero rating: 5+ starsHeroine rating: 5 starsSexual tension rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes rating: 5 starsSex scenes frequency: 4.5 starsPlot rating: 5+ starsDialogue rating: 5 starsStorytelling rating: 5 starsStory ending rating: 4.5 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): N/A, beta************************************************Overall rating: 5 starsWould I recommend this book: Yes.Would I re-read this book: Yes.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.A gifted copy was provided by author/publisher for an honest review.

“God, he was intense. And deliberate. And he could say things with his eyes that made my knees tremble.”The Paper Swan (stand-alone) is an epic love story of love and vengeance, deceit and forgiveness spanning decades.  It opens up in present day to heiress Skye Sedgewick finding herself kidnapped and stored in a crate before getting loaded onto a boat.  Her captor Damian Caballero is on a set course in his quest for vengeance, more on why to unfold with story.Being kept away for her pampered life and trying to decipher her captor’s motives puts Skye’s life into a tailspin.  She is forced to dig deep traveling back into childhood putting all the pieces together while discovering that not everything is as picturesque as she thought.“You’re ruled by things I can’t compete with. Your rage trumps love, and hope, and faith.”Falling for Damian is not option. It’s the love that can never be yet it’s inevitable that these two lost souls find a deeper connection.  For a brief moment in time there is only them and their love until reality kicks in and Damian must continue on his quest.Their love will test them;< their beliefs and values while putting everything on the line. It’s an epic tale; dark, gruesome, painful, poignant, but most of all it’s a story of soul searching passion and unending love.“I wanted to stay with him so I could put together all the dented, shattered parts of him, because I could never be whole where he was broken.”DAMIAN CABALLERO:  Mexican/27 years/Self-employed/Dark hair/Dark eyes.Eight words to describe Damian Caballero: Strong, determined, broken, loyal, noble, conflicted, detached and stubborn.SKYE SEDGEWICK: American/24 years/Heiress/Fashion/Blond hair/Gray eyes.Eight words to describe Skye Sedgewick: Trusting, loyal, strong, nurturing, conflicted, reserved, reflective and adaptable.The Paper Swan, told from alternating POVs, is a life story and a love story.  With a fairytale feel it depicts profound sadness, painful secrets, life-altering deception and heart-wrenching disappointments.  But in all its darkness there is hope for the healing power of forgiveness and a love that transcends time.  As for ending it was closure, but I’d welcome a. epilogue further into the future.Spell-binding story-telling!  Epic saga!  Consuming plot!  Emotional journey!  Excellent character development!“Sometimes everything gets dismantled so something better can be pieced together.”***Hero rating: 5 starsHeroine rating: 5 starsSexual tension rating: 5 starsSex scenes rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes frequency: 4 starsPlot rating: 5 starsDialogue rating: 5 starsStorytelling rating: 5 starsStory ending rating: 4.5 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): N/A, ARC************************************************Overall rating: 5 starsWould I recommend this book: Yes.Would I re-read this book: Yes.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.A gifted copy was provided by author/publisher for an honest review.

To me, this story is not so much about pushing boundaries in society but rather pushing them within yourself… It’s not about going against sacred customs and religion on the contrary it embraces divinity. And though it has plenty of kinky sex in sacred places it is a LOVE story.Priest opens up to just another day in scholar and Father Tyler Anselm Bell’s life. As the door closes behind his regular Tuesday confession a stranger enters the booth, a very mysterious stranger with sultry voice and red lipstick.New in town heiress, MBA graduate and corporate executive Poppy Danforth come to make a confession about a less proud time in her life working as stripper for an exclusive gentlemen’s club. By next week’s confession they have a personal encounter and it’s electric.Doomed from the start, the friendship and relationship that develops is clouded in secrecy and deceit. As Poppy searches for spiritual awakening and growth, Tyler questions his purpose and a higher truth. Their fierce attraction inevitably leads to off-the-charts sex skating the edge of danger of discovery as they set out not to define what is sacred, but to embrace it on a deeper level.FATHER TYLER ANSELM BELL: 29 years/Masters in Divinity/Catholic priest/Dark hair/Green eyes.Father Tyler Anselm Bell masters the balance between commanding, kinky, dirty-talking and inexhaustible lover and tender, sweet, caring, sincere and respectful friend and confidant.POPPY DANFORTH: 27 years/Heiress/MBA/Executive/Former stripper/Brown-black hair/Hazel eyes.Poppy Danforth was a bit of an enigma throughout with story partly due to story being Tyler’s POV Seven words to describe Poppy: Captivating, charismatic, sexy, irresistible, evasive, lost and seeking.Priest, told solely from Tyler’s POV is a glimpse into a heart-tugging struggle for truth and purpose; right and wrong; to have or not to have. Tyler is forced into questioning his choices, his existence and his future. It is not a stand against religion on the contrary. But above all this is a love story.The ending told from Poppy’s POV, offers clarity and closure. Though writing flowed I might have wished for fewer parentheses. On a side note I’d welcome Sterling story!Effortless dialogue and story-telling! Excellent character development! Thought-provoking plot! Sizzling sexual tension and sex scenes! Endearing, sexy and kinky hero! A love story to remember!***Hero rating: 4 starsHeroine rating: 4 starsSexual tension rating: 5 starsSex scenes rating: 5 starsSex scenes frequency: 4 starsPlot rating: 4.5 starsDialogue rating: 5 starsStorytelling rating: 4.5 starsStory ending rating: 4.5 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): 4.5 stars************************************************Overall rating: 4.5 starsWould I recommend this book: Yes.Would I re-read this book: Maybe later.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.A gifted copy was provided by author/publisher for an honest review.

She was wishy-washy, insecure and meek. But…. this is HER journey of self-discovery and growth and in the end I had a 4.5 star heroine; a woman who grew into her own, made decisions, dealt with consequences, took risks and embraced life.My Time in the Affair, told mostly from Mischa’s POV, is a candid look into an affair taking us on sky-high ups and rock-bottom lows. Both tangible and angsty it deals with how her decision affects her and the people around her.Story is a nail biter all the way to ending and epilogue. The Reckless duet is using different Publishers for the US and the UK, hence the different covers and titles.  Books must be read in order:Book 1:  Power and Possession (US) / Pushing the Limits (UK)Book 2:  Seduction and Surrender (US) / Untitled (UK)The Reckless duet, book 1 opens up to university student Nicole Parrish (Dominic Knight’s niece, featured in the All or Nothing trilogy) spending her summer traipsing Europe’s exclusive hot spots with her best friend Fiona.  Just having graduated from Stanford and not quite ready to continue with grad school she has decided to live and party recklessly for the summer.Playboy, heir and sole owner of Contini Pharmaceuticals, Rafail Contini, Rafe is throwing another VIP party onboard is ultra-luxurious yacht. While cooped up in his suite with a diplomat’s wife he’s interrupted by a dark-haired beauty, Nicole, in search of a restroom.  Having had his fair share of women and kink, including the darker side of sex since the age of fifteen, his interest is peeked so he asks Nicole to stay.  Introductions are made and drinks are poured.Rafe and Nicole are instantly attracted to each other and both feel the tug of lust. On a whim they decide to embark on 2 weeks of no-questions-asked sex.  With their single-minded agenda they set out to get rid of the diplomat’s wife, occupy her friend, make arrangements to handle parents, women vying and more as they try to leave his yacht.The story goes onto follow them on their flirtation, f ***k fest and beyond as enemies close in on Rafe’s empire and Nicole’s uncle Dominic is nearby with his entourage.  Add to that Nicole’s temper and Rafe’s propensity to want what he wants when he wants it; A power war with both players fighting their attraction ill-equipped to handle feelings and compromise…There you have it!  Either a train wreck of epic proportions or…  a love story that transcends time and reason and inspire sonnets…  Time will tell!RAFAIL CONTINI, Rafe:  26 years/Swiss-Romanian/Heir/$$$$/Owner Contini Pharma./Dark hair/Amber eyes/6’4”/Tattooed d** k.Rafail Contini, Rafe with his masterpiece of an inked d** k (yup tattooed!) falls into the category of playBOY alpha. As story digs deeper into his childhood there are issues that clearly colored his life and personality.  Used to having his way with women and everything else in life; his looks, money and name afford him that, he finds Nicole a refreshing challenge.  She will make him work for it!Ten words to describe Rafe: Jaded, impulsive, enigmatic, private, detached, kinky, determined, possessives, broken and complex.NICOLE PARRISH:  22 years/$$$$/American/Student/Stanford graduate/Dark hair/Blue eyes.Nicole Parrish has had a coddled upbringing and thus used to getting her way.  She’s prickly and blaze, boys falling at her feet, but she met Rafe once at Stanford and he didn’t give her the time of day.  That both irked and intrigued her.Ten words to describe Nicole: Spoiled, prickly, immature, kind, bossy, smart, focused, hot-headed, secretive and jaded.The Reckless duet, book 1 is truly a whirlwind romance as the too-beautiful-for-their-own-good Rafe and Nicole come to terms with their fierce attraction and lust.  Though dealing with Nicole’s temper and feisty-ness goes to illustrate the lengths Rafe will go to appease her when in all his life he never bent for anyone, right in the beginning, before sex, I felt she was being too difficult at times.Reckless series, book 1 ends with Rafe and Nicole in a good place, no> cliffhanger, but with the understanding that there is more to their story in  book 2 in the Reckless duet.***At the end of book 1 there is a teaser from book 2. Please note the book 2 teaser does have a bit of a cliffy so you might want that stop with book 1’s ending!Effortless storytelling!  Butterflies-in-your belly plot!  Larger-than-life playBOY alpha, Rafe and a heroine to keep him on his toes and the ability to get him on his knees…***Hero rating: 5 starsHeroine rating: 4starsSexual tension rating: 5 starsSex scenes rating: 5 starsSex scenes frequency: 5 starsPlot rating: 5 starsDialogue rating: 4.5 starsStorytelling rating: 5 starsStory ending rating: N/ABook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): N/A, ARC************************************************Overall rating: 5 starsWould I recommend this series: Yes.Would I re-read this book: Yes.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.Be sure to join CCGibbsFANS on Goodreads for the latest news! “I'm not heartless— my heart is just hardened, while the rest of me is hollow.”Books in series should be read in order:Book 1: Monster in His EyesBook 2: Torture to Her SoulIn Monster in His Eyes (book 1) university student Karissa Reed, Kissimmee was swept off her feet by the mysterious and mercurial Ignazio Vitale, Naz.  He seduced and pursued her while warning her off.Karissa, who was coddled and naïve, wanted to believe the best in people and her situation. Nothing could have prepared her for the brutal truth nor the shocking events leading up to the revelation and chaotic ending.Torture to Her Soul (book 2), told from Naz’s POV, picks up right after book 1’s violent and shocking ending.  Their lives are in turmoil and Naz is desperately trying to bridge the gap and open the lines of communication.  Karissa is hurt, shocked and angry, but she cannot deny still feeling a connection and attraction to Naz.Naz can force and put pressure, but does he want to?  It’s a slow re-building of trust based on revelations and confessions.  But there is more to come plus the evil all around them is closing in.  Soon it’s not just about them finding their way back together rather them finding a way out….  But do they want to?It’s a journey of good versus evil, truths and lies, joy and pain and the fact that everything in life comes at a price…“We're a tragedy in the making. The game of tug-of-war we're playing will end up destroying us, because she doesn't have it in her to surrender, and I can't let go.”IGNAZIO VITALE, Naz:  36 years/Freelancer/Brown hair/Blue eyes.Ignazio Vitale, Naz is a tortured, broken soul yet reflective.  When tragedy struck him at age eighteen instead of grieving he sought the path of vengeance.  It is a heart-wrenching, candid glimpse into the life of a man who trusts no one, leans on no one, rarely sleeps, barely eats and obsessively organizes his life.Eight words to describe Naz: Mysterious, mercurial, closed-off, imperfect, broken, ruthless, possessive and nurturing.“It's hard to feel alive when you've been obliterated inside, hard to feel real when you no longer remember how to dream.”KARISSA REED, Kissimmee:  18 years/College student/Brown hair.Eight words to describe Karissa Reed, Kissimmee: Naïve, lonely insecure, impressionable, smart, inadequate, immature and sheltered.“She looks broken, but so godd*mn beautiful. I want to put her back together. I want to break her down even more.”Torture to Her Soul is raw and violent.  Story does not attempt to sugar-coat the truth of what and who Naz is.  It’s about redemption for the irredeemable as many of their issues have no answer, no fixing, no redemption…  When reading one has to be prepared not to get it all.  As much as I think I needed my HEA, everything wrapped up in a tight bow, I feel the author did a good job of staying true to their situation.The epilogue and bonus chapters were amazing, not sure I could have handled story without them.  I’d welcome more further into their future, but I am happy were it left them!Candid POV from a very memorable hero!  Captivating plot!  Excellent story-telling!“Sometimes secrets have the power to kill. The power to destroy. We each hold nuclear weapons inside of us.”***Hero rating: 5 starsHeroine rating: 4 starsSexual tension rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes frequency: 4 starsPlot rating: 4 starsDialogue rating: 4.5 starsStorytelling rating: 4.5 starsStory ending rating: 4.5 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): 4 stars************************************************Overall rating: 4.5 starsWould I recommend this series: Yes.Would I re-read this series: Maybe later.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.

"That's life, Chloe.  That's living."Alarm (stand-alone) is corporate project manager Chloe Ellison, Clo's story, told entirely from her POV.  It opens up to her mundane, cautious, lonely and rather OCD existence being frustrated with her boss and reflecting over her non-existent dating life.  After a night-out with friends she is shocked to wake up in a stranger's bed, a very tattooed and wickedly handsome stranger's bed I might add.Aiden Hunter claims to work in sales and is just visiting.  He rescued an intoxicated Chloe after she passed out. He did not have his way with her comatose body.  Once that is sorted out, neither can deny that there is an attraction.  On a whim Aiden invites Chloe to fly back to Florida with him and visit for a week.Even though the "alarm" is going off in Chloe's head she decides to go out on a limb and take him up on his offer.  The story goes on to follow their budding romance during the visit and beyond as Aiden pushes and coaches Chloe to live a little both inside and outside the bedroom.Set against the backdrop of "who is Aiden Hunter?" and "what is he hiding?" it quickly becomes clear that these polar opposites have much more in common and Chloe isn't the only one needing lessons in living...AIDEN HUNTER:  27 years/Sales/Black hair/Hazel eyes/Beard/Tattoos.Seven words to describe Aiden Hunter: Mysterious, observant, broken, enigmatic, chivalrous, spontaneous and loyal.CHLOE ELLISON, Clo:  27 years/Project management/Brown hair/Blue eyes/OCD.Seven words to describe Chloe Ellison, Clo: Sweet, reflective, meek, OCD, lonely, unhappy and non-confrontational.Alarm offers a little of everything; romance, self-reflection and growth, steamy sex scenes, humorous situations, adventures and the unfolding of a mystery.  Story takes Aiden and Chloe on a roller-coaster of events and emotions only to arrive at a well-deserved sweet yet somewhat rushed ending.  I'd welcome an extended epilogue from Aiden's POV!It's a message of hope and new beginnings!  A feel-good read with two lost souls helping each out find their way home!"You helped me learn how to deal with life, and now I'll help you learn how to deal with..."***Hero rating: 4 starsHeroine rating: 3.5 starsSexual tension rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes rating: 4.5 starsSex scenes frequency: 4 starsPlot rating: 4 starsDialogue rating: 4 starsStorytelling rating: 4.5 starsStory ending rating: 4 starsBook editing rating (5 = no edits spotted): N/A************************************************Overall rating: 4 starsWould I recommend this book: Yes.Would I re-read this book: Maybe later.Would I read future books by this author: Yes.A gifted copy ARC provided to me by author /publisher in exchange for an honest review.

"All I wanted was sex. Just a little freaky sex, every now and then. When the f*** did it get so complicated?" he grumbled."Books in The Kane Trilogy should be read in order:Book 1: DegradationBook 2: SeparationBook 3: ReparationPart 3.5: Completion - Extended epilogueIn Degradation (book 1) and Separation (book 2) Tatum E. O'Shea, Tate crossed paths with Jameson Kraven Kane, Kane aka Satan seven years after being caught in a compromising position with him while he dated her sister.Upon their reunion Jameson Kane relentlessly pursued Tate to commit to an open sexual relationship, but Tate, older and wilder, wasn't easily coerced.  Sexually liberated she was up for the aggressive sex with a dirty-talking Jameson, but she was scared of being swallowed alive by the force that is Jameson.The game/power struggle that ensued, complicated by villains, jealousy and confusion, was nothing short of volatile sprinkled by witty bantering, amazing sex and hints of deeper emotions...Reparation (book 3) is the continuation of the path that was taken in book 2 it's about trying to repair what has been damaged or needs fixing.  Though their story has been riddled with complications, villains and jealous exes, their biggest obstacles has always come from within!It's a bumpy road ahead of confusion and revenge; self-reflection, growth, forgiveness and repair.  But ultimately it's about redemption; finding common ground, learning to yield to ones feelings and the sacrifices that comes along with that..."Make me, baby girl," he taunted."JAMESON KRAVEN KANE, Kane aka Satan:  31 years/MBA from Yale/Mogul/Investor/$$$$/Black hair/Blue eyes/6'2"/Multi-lingual.Jameson Kraven Kane, Kane aka Satan with his classic good looks and larger-than-life presence has cemented himself on my top-10-hero shelf.  Ten words to describe Jameson Kane aka Satan:  Ruthless, enigmatic, closed-off, blunt, dirty-talker, jaded, private, callous, charming and secretive.TATUM E. O'SHEA, Tate:  26 years/College drop-out/Bartender/Temp/Black-brown hair/Brown eyes/5'5".Tatum E. O'Shea, Tate is one of the best heroines I have ever met.  The complexity of her character never seized to amaze me.  Don't be fooled by the self-proclaimed slut as there is so many more layers to her!  Ten words to describe Tate:  Unpredictable, care-free, smart, bad-ass, strong, vulnerable, enigmatic, liberated, endearing and captivating.Reparation is the final chapter in one of the best series I have ever read.  What a journey of euphoric highs and rock-bottom lows. There is such brilliance and depth to this series that I cannot begin to address.  It's better you read for yourself!The story ended on a high with everything coming full circle, but I am happy to report that per reader demand there will be a bonus EXTENDED epilogue, Completion (part 3.5) giving us a glimpse two years into their future.Outstanding character development!
